message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $110 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
